title: NFL Draft: Most Interesting Teams Pt. 1, Top 5 EDGE/DL Prospects plus Christian McCaffrey extension (Football 4/14)
description:
It's not quite emergency podcast level, but Christian McCaffrey did sign a 4-year extension making him the highest-paid RB in NFL history. Your host and Carolina native Will Brinson quickly breaks down the move (0:10). Then, Ryan Wilson and Sean Wagner-McGough hop on to kick off our 3-part series on the most interesting teams in the NFL Draft, with a focus on the Dolphins (7:20) and Cowboys (18:20). Then, draft expert Chris Trapasso joins Will to rank his Top 5 EDGE rushers (30:00) and Top 5 defensive linemen (46:30) in the 2020 Draft.

'Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Google Podcasts, Castbox and wherever else you listen to podcasts. 
Follow the Pick Six team on Twitter: @picksixpod @WillBrinson, @ChrisTrapasso
SCheck out the Pick Six Instagram page https://www.instagram.com/picksixpod/?hl=en
Join our Facebook group https://www.facebook.com/groups/758548147935545/
For more NFL coverage from CBS Sports, visit https://www.cbssports.com/nfl/
To hear more from the CBS Sports Podcast Network, visit https://www.cbssports.com/podcasts/
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices

itunes:author: CBS Sports, Football, NFL, NFL Picks, NFL Betting, 2022 NFL, NFL Predictions, NFL Recap
itunes:subtitle: The interest level for each team in the draft varies, but we've decided to highlight the most interesting. In part one, we focus on the Dolphins and Cowboys.
